page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS- DINAS
page.content: The information - both written contributions and photographs -about Dinas village and its immediate area was collated and recorded by pupils and teachers of Ysgol Dinas (Dinas C.P.School). The headmaster, who was in charge of the whole project in the school, was Terwyn Tomos.He was supported by Mrs.Clare Thomas, whose class conducted several surveys and wrote a number of the pages recorded here. The whole Domesday Project at Dinas School was part of a larger theme of environmental studies and studying the community. Most of the 51 children at the school could not contribute directly to the recorded work, but each and every pupil was involved in the preparatory work.
